dict.string: # get the workflow's source folder set workflowFolder to do shell script "pwd" # load the Workflow library set wlib to load script POSIX file (workflowFolder & "/q_workflow.scpt") # create a new Workflow Class set wf to wlib's new_workflow() set q to wf's q_split(wf's q_trim("{query}"), " ") if (count of q) > 0 then set ctrl to first item of wf's q_split(q, " ") set option to wf's q_join(rest of q, " ") else set ctrl to "" set option to "" end if set simple_commands to {"play", "pause", "like", "dislike", "skip", "tired", "playpause", "mute", "unmute", "loud", "louder", "softer", "show"} set complex_commands to {"volume", "station"} if ctrl is not in complex_commands or application "Hermes" is not running then repeat with cmd in simple_commands if ctrl is "" or ctrl is missing value or ctrl is in cmd then add_result of wf with isValid given theUid:cmd, theArg:cmd, theTitle:cmd, theSubtitle:"", theAutocomplete:missing value, theIcon:missing value, theType:missing value end if end repeat repeat with cmd in complex_commands if ctrl is "" or ctrl is missing value or ctrl is in cmd then add_result of wf without isValid given theUid:cmd, theArg:missing value, theTitle:cmd, theSubtitle:"", theAutocomplete:cmd & " ", theIcon:missing value, theType:missing value end if end repeat return wf's to_xml("") else if ctrl is "station" then tell application "Hermes" set allStations to stations repeat with thisStation in allStations if option is "" or name of thisStation contains option then add_result of wf with isValid given theUid:station ID of thisStation, theArg:"station " & name of thisStation, theTitle:name of thisStation, theSubtitle:"", theAutocomplete:missing value, theIcon:missing value, theType:missing value end if end repeat end tell else if ctrl is "volume" then set option_commands to {"up", "down"} repeat with sub in option_commands if option is "" or option is in sub then add_result of wf with isValid given theUid:"volume " & sub, theArg:"volume " & sub, theTitle:"volume " & sub, theSubtitle:"", theAutocomplete:missing value, theIcon:missing value, theType:missing value end if end repeat if option is "" or option is not in option_commands then add_result of wf with isValid given theUid:"volume", theArg:"{query}", theTitle:"Set volume to " & option, theSubtitle:"", theAutocomplete:missing value, theIcon:missing value, theType:missing value end if end if wf's to_xml("")

set q to "{query}" try set ctrl to word 1 of (q as string) on error set ctrl to (q as string) end try try set option to text ((length of ctrl) + 2) thru end of (q as string) on error set option to "" end try tell application "Hermes" if ctrl = "like" or ctrl = "good" or ctrl is equal to "+" then thumbs up else if ctrl = "dislike" or ctrl = "bad" or ctrl = "-" then thumbs down else if ctrl = "skip" or ctrl = "next" or ctrl = "~" then next song else if ctrl = "tired" or ctrl = "!" then tired of song else if ctrl = "play" or ctrl = ">" then play else if ctrl = "pause" or ctrl = "#" then pause else if ctrl = "playpause" or ctrl = "pp" then playpause else if ctrl = "mute" or ctrl = "silence" or ctrl = "m" then mute else if ctrl = "unmute" or ctrl = "u" then unmute else if ctrl = "loud" or ctrl = "f" then maximize volume else if ctrl = "louder" or ctrl = "l" then increase volume else if ctrl = "softer" or ctrl = "quieter" or ctrl = "q" then decrease volume else if ctrl = "volume" or ctrl = "v" then if option is "up" then increase volume else if option is "down" then decrease volume else set playback volume to option end if else if ctrl = "show" or ctrl = "activate" or ctrl = "a" or ctrl = "" then activate else if ctrl = "station" or ctrl = "switch" or ctrl = "s" then set current station to station option end if end tell
